examples.korean: The evidence against him is pretty flimsy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그에 대한 증거는 좀 설득력이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The evidence against him is pretty flimsy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Everyone was roped in to help with the show. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 사람들이 설득을 당해 그 쇼를 돕게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Everyone was roped in to help with the show. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We were recruited to help peel the vegetables. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그 채소들 껍질을 벗겨 달라는 설득을 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were recruited to help peel the vegetables. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This kind of evidence is philosophically unconvincing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이런 종류의 증거는 철학적으로 설득력이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This kind of evidence is philosophically unconvincing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our efforts to persuade her proved fruitless. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀를 설득하려던 우리의 노력은 결국 아무 성과가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our efforts to persuade her proved fruitless. Add to Wordbook
